org.axiondb.types
Class BaseDataType

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.axiondb.types.BaseDataType
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataType, DataTypeFactory, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AnyType, BaseNumberDataType, BooleanType, CharacterType, LOBType, ObjectType, StringType, TimestampType
public abstract class BaseDataType
extends Object
implements DataType, DataTypeFactory

Abstract base implemention of DataType.

Version:
$Revision: 1.11 $ $Date: 2003/05/14 19:07:30 $
